Fire Protection Engineering

This guide was created to help students and faculty find information in the field of Fire Protection Engineering.

Library Services

    Access all the UMD Libraries' online subscriptions.

LibChat

Chat with library staff or browse the Libraries' Ask Us! page. 

Chat service is typically available Monday-Friday 8AM-8PM. Need help outside of this time? You can always submit your questions and someone will get back to as soon as possible.

Fire Protection Engineering Resources

  • AAA - ASTM Compass
    Online access to ASTM standards.

Below are a few recommended databases. You can access all the databases UMCP subscribes to via Database Finder.

  • Building and Fire Research Laboratory (BFRL)
  • FIREDOC
  • AAA - MADCAD
    Cross-searchable collection of building, plumbing, fire and maintenance codes and standards from BOCA, SBCC, ICBO, ILL, and NFPA.
  • AAA - Scopus
    Broad coverage science and social science database. Especially strong in health-related fields. Includes analytical tools.
  • AAA - Web of Science
    Broad coverage science database. Includes analytical tools.

Journal Search

Use this link to search for a specific journal by title.

Book Search (and more)

WorldCat UM lets you search the University of Maryland Libraries and beyond for books and other media.
